Uses of Interface
com.incadencecorp.coalesce.api.ICoalesceComponent

  • Packages that use ICoalesceComponent 
    Package Description
    com.incadencecorp.coalesce.api
    Contains APIs and supporting classes used by Coalesce
    com.incadencecorp.coalesce.framework
    Contains classes used for creating a new instance of Coalesce for accessing and modifying Coalesce Entities.
    com.incadencecorp.coalesce.framework.jobs
    This package contains jobs that are threaded off to handled specific tasks.
    com.incadencecorp.coalesce.framework.persistance
    Contains base classes for creating persistors to store and retrieve Coalesce Entitites from different databases.
    com.incadencecorp.coalesce.framework.tasks
    This package contains tasks for each job for parallel processing.
    com.incadencecorp.coalesce.handlers
    Handler implementations are used to handle operation errors.
    com.incadencecorp.coalesce.services.common.jobs  
    com.incadencecorp.coalesce.services.crud.service.jobs
    Contains jobs used by the CRUD service.
    com.incadencecorp.coalesce.services.crud.service.tasks
    Contains tasks used by the CRUD service.
    com.incadencecorp.coalesce.services.search.service.jobs
    Contains jobs used by the service.
    com.incadencecorp.coalesce.services.search.service.tasks
    Contains tasks used by the service.
    com.incadencecorp.coalesce.synchronizer.api
    Contains APIs for creating components to run in the synchronizer service.
    com.incadencecorp.coalesce.synchronizer.api.common
    Contains abstract implementations of the interfaces along with classes used by the interfaces.
    com.incadencecorp.coalesce.synchronizer.service.drivers
    Contains driver implementations.
    com.incadencecorp.coalesce.synchronizer.service.operations
    Contains operation implementations.
    com.incadencecorp.coalesce.synchronizer.service.scanners
    Contains scanner implementations.

    • Uses of ICoalesceComponent in com.incadencecorp.coalesce.framework.jobs

      Classes in com.incadencecorp.coalesce.framework.jobs that implement ICoalesceComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractCoalesceJob<INPUT,OUTPUT extends ICoalesceResponseType<List<TASKOUTPUT>>,TASKOUTPUT extends ICoalesceResponseType<?>>
      Abstract base for jobs in Coalesce.
      class  AbstractCoalescePersistorsJob<INPUT>
      Abstract base for jobs that perform the same task with the same parameters for each persister configured.
      class  AbstractCoalesceTargetJob<INPUT,OUTPUT extends ICoalesceResponseType<List<TASKOUTPUT>>,TASKOUTPUT extends ICoalesceResponseType<?>,TARGET>
      Abstract base for jobs that spawn multiple task depending on parameters of the input.
      class  CoalesceRegisterTemplateJob
      This job registers templates.
      class  CoalesceSaveEntityJob 
      class  CoalesceSaveTemplateJob

      This task saves templates.

    • Uses of ICoalesceComponent in com.incadencecorp.coalesce.handlers

      Classes in com.incadencecorp.coalesce.handlers that implement ICoalesceComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FileExceptionHandlerImpl
      This implementation creates a file with the name as the entity's key that caused the error.
      class  LoggerExceptionHandlerImpl
      This implementation will log the failure as a warning along with the stack trace if DEBUG is enabled.
      class  PassThroughExceptionHandlerImpl
      This implementation always returns false indicating that the caller needs to handle the error message.
      Methods in com.incadencecorp.coalesce.handlers with parameters of type ICoalesceComponent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean PassThroughExceptionHandlerImpl.handle(String[] keys, ICoalesceComponent caller, Exception e) 
      boolean LoggerExceptionHandlerImpl.handle(String[] keys, ICoalesceComponent caller, Exception e) 
      boolean FileExceptionHandlerImpl.handle(String[] keys, ICoalesceComponent caller, Exception e)

      class  AbstractServiceJob<INPUT extends BaseRequest,OUTPUT extends ICoalesceResponseType<List<TASKOUTPUT>>,TASKOUTPUT extends ICoalesceResponseType<?>,TARGET>
      Abstract base class used by Coalesce services restricting the input to an XSD object.

    • Uses of ICoalesceComponent in com.incadencecorp.coalesce.synchronizer.api

      Subinterfaces of ICoalesceComponent in com.incadencecorp.coalesce.synchronizer.api 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IPersistorDriver
      This interface is for creating driver implementations to perform some operation(s) based the result set of a scan.
      interface  IPersistorOperation
      This interface is used for creating operations that read entities from a source, does some processing, and stores the results in the target(s).
      interface  IPersistorScan
      This interface is used for creating different scanning logic to retrieve a result set.

    • Uses of ICoalesceComponent in com.incadencecorp.coalesce.synchronizer.api.common

      Classes in com.incadencecorp.coalesce.synchronizer.api.common that implement ICoalesceComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDriver
      Abstract implementation which is the base of all drivers.
      class  AbstractOperation<T extends AbstractOperationTask>
      Abstract implementation which is the base of all operations.
      class  AbstractScan
      Abstract implementation to be used as the base of all scanner implementations.

    • Uses of ICoalesceComponent in com.incadencecorp.coalesce.synchronizer.service.drivers

      Classes in com.incadencecorp.coalesce.synchronizer.service.drivers that implement ICoalesceComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IntervalDriverImpl
      This implementation executes a scan on a configurable interval and performs operations in sequential order on the results of the scan.
      class  PropertyDriverImpl
      This implementation extends IntervalDriverImpl and adds a criteria requiring a property to be true for it to execute.

    • Uses of ICoalesceComponent in com.incadencecorp.coalesce.synchronizer.service.operations

      Classes in com.incadencecorp.coalesce.synchronizer.service.operations that implement ICoalesceComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CopyOperationImpl
      This implementation copies entities from the source to the target(s).
      class  ExceptionOperationImpl
      This implementation will always throw an Exception for testing error handling.
      class  RecordOperationImpl
      This implementation writes the keys of entities that need to be updated to a file system.
      class  UpdateVersionOperationImpl
      This implementation attempts to update entities that are out of date.

    • Uses of ICoalesceComponent in com.incadencecorp.coalesce.synchronizer.service.scanners

      Classes in com.incadencecorp.coalesce.synchronizer.service.scanners that implement ICoalesceComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AfterLastModifiedScanImpl
      This implementation looks for changes after a given DateTime which is either passed in as a parameter or read from the configured property loader.
      class  FileScanImpl
      This implementation checks a directory for files that have been created with their names being keys of entities.
